intro: Cleanthe lugens, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its velvety, waxy leaves and showy, tubular flowers. The plant typically grows as a compact, upright herb with a short stem and dense foliage. Its flowers come in a variety of colors, including shades of purple, pink, white, and red. Cleanthe lugens thrives in bright, indirect light and requires well-draining soil to prevent root rot.
